english.segment1: Oh your hands of kindness are here for me. And I have heard they are silken and can carry me
english.segment2: How I love you. All I am is you. King of love I bow
english.segment3: Oh your hands of mercy were scarred for me. And your body was broken so that I go free
english.segment4: Oh your love that burns me, deeper than the sea. And the treasure I find here, the saviour's love for me
